resources.string: Change your device settings so you can search for nearby shops that connect with PayPal.
Use your PayPal debit card to withdraw at any MoneyPass ATM without a fee.
Don\'t have your card handy\? No problem â€“ you can still withdraw from many ATMs using your PayPal app.
Pay with your mobile at some of your favourite shops, restaurants and more. Since you\'re using PayPal, your financial information is securely encrypted.
The shops you love,\n the security you\'re used to
Pay ahead too, then collect it and go. It\'s perfect for picking up food on the way.
Please make sure your device is not in flight mode and is connected to either Wi-Fi or mobile data.
You need to be closer to pay.
Get an up-to-the-minute list of nearby shops, restaurants and more that accept PayPal.
Please check back soon. We\'re adding new restaurants, shops and more all the time.
Try searching in a different location or moving the map around.
We\'re sorry, we hit a snag. Give it another try shortly.
Add your credit or debit card to pay in store. If you\'ve already added a card to your PayPal account, it might have expired or it may not have been confirmed yet.
Confirm your mobile number and create a PIN in your account. When you\'re ready to pay, choose PayPal at the till, enter your mobile number and PIN, and you\'re good to go.
Take a moment to create a PIN in your Settings. Then, when you\'re ready to pay, choose PayPal at the till, enter your mobile number and PIN, and you\'re good to go.
